description.value:
Bootleg Anesthetic, makes you feel drunk, numbs the body and mind.

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Abundant

Notes: -
description.summary: Bootleg Anesthetic, makes you feel drunk, numbs the body and mind.
